verses.roman:
śuniyā grāmera loka cintita ha-ila
prathame gopāla lañā gāṅṭhuli-grāme khuila

synonyms: śuniyā—hearing; grāmera loka—all the people in the village; cintita ha-ila—became very anxious; prathame—first; gopāla lañā—taking Gopāla; gāṅṭhuli-grāme—in the village known as Gāṅṭhuli; khuila—kept Him hidden.
translation: Hearing this, all the villagers became very anxious. They first took Gopāla and moved Him to a village known as Gāṅṭhuli.
